title: LED's Pierson on Economic Impact of the Louisiana Flood (Audio)
itunes:title: LED's Pierson on Economic Impact of the Louisiana Flood (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Don Pierson, Louisiana’s Secretary of Economic Development, on the economic impact of the Louisiana flooding.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
